body_html:
I am using tensorflow-1.1.0rc2, when I use the code for:
scell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.GRUCell(embedding_size)

I get the following error:
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.ops.nn' has no attribute 'rnn_cell'

Any idea what to use instead for 1.1.0rc2 version? Looks like it has been removed but I couldn't find any good documentation for the solution.
body_text:
I am using tensorflow-1.1.0rc2, when I use the code for:
scell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.GRUCell(embedding_size)
I get the following error:
AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.ops.nn' has no attribute 'rnn_cell'
Any idea what to use instead for 1.1.0rc2 version? Looks like it has been removed but I couldn't find any good documentation for the solution.
body:
I am using tensorflow-1.1.0rc2, when I use the code for:
`scell = tf.nn.rnn_cell.GRUCell(embedding_size)`

I get the following error:
`AttributeError: module 'tensorflow.python.ops.nn' has no attribute 'rnn_cell'`

Any idea what to use instead for 1.1.0rc2 version? Looks like it has been removed but I couldn't find any good documentation for the solution.
